roleset.name: to destroy decisively, wreck
roleset.note: TORPEDO-V NOTES: Frames file for 'torpedo' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from torpedo.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Such an offer could torpedo a plan [*ICH*-1] by Lion Nathan Ltd. of New Zealand [*]to acquire half the brewing interests .
example.arg: a plan [*ICH*-1] by Lion Nathan Ltd. of New Zealand [*]to acquire half the brewing interests
